text: Francisco Eugenio Provvidente (first name also spelled Francesco) (born February 1, 1914 in Buenos Aires) was an Argentine professional football player. He also held Italian citizenship. He played for 2 seasons (21 games, 5 goals) in the Serie A for A.S. Roma. ==External links== Category:1914 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Boca Juniors footballers Category:Argentine expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Brazil Category:Clube de Regatas do Flamengo footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.S. title: Francisco Provvidente
